abstract: Blue Bell Creameries recalls all of its products after some samplings tested positive for bacteria listeriosis.
lead_paragraph: Two samplings of chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream tested positive for listeriosis, a food-borne illness.

headline.main: Blue Bell Issues Recall for All Its Ice Cream
headline.print_headline: Blue Bell Issues Recall for All its Ice Cream

snippet: Two samplings of chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream tested positive for listeriosis, a food-borne illness.
